Line27.6D03F: There was a prophecy, yes. It foretold the rise of the Prime Evils. The return of Lilith and Inarius. The doom of our world.
Line29.6D03F: Inarius adopted the prophecy for his own selfish purposes—put it in the Cathedral of Light’s gospel and made it seem like he would be the hero to save us.
VoiceDir27.6D03F: Somewhat reluctant to get into details
